pull.title: doc: add detached release notes for #14060
pull.body: Adding detached release notes for #14060 in order to assist with https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14688.

events.message: doc: add detached release notes for #14060

events.body:
I think this is fine, but I do think it would help keep the length of the overall release notes more reasonable by shortening this particular news item down to a single bullet point by simply mentioning the bare essentials and then linking to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/zmq.md#usage

I'm happy to do that myself when I make another notes update in early December.
thanks guys. @harding sounds good to me.
